properties.Event: Castle Street and Howe Street Parties
properties.Advice: Self-isolate, test immediately and on day 5 after you were exposed at this location of interest. Further isolation and testing requirements will be provided by Public Health

You are a CLOSE CONTACT if you were seated in row 21, 22, 23, 24, 25. Close Contacts - self-isolate for 7 days, test on day 5 after you were exposed at this location of interest. Monitor symptoms for 10 days. Test again if you feel unwell.
